flavorText: ". . . The kingdoms three are now the stuff of dream, / For men to ponder, past all praise or blame."

foreignData.name: 黄道の龍
foreignData.text: 黄道の龍が戦場からあなたの墓地に置かれたとき、あなたはそれをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ドラゴン

name: Zodiac Dragon
originalText: If Zodiac Dragon is put into your graveyard, you may return Zodiac Dragon to your hand.

rulings.text: If Zodiac Dragon is removed from the graveyard after the ability triggers but before it resolves, you can’t return it to your hand. Similarly, if a replacement effect has Zodiac Dragon move to a different zone instead of being put into the graveyard, the ability won’t trigger at all.
Even though Zodiac Dragon is a Dragon, it doesn’t have flying.

text: When Zodiac Dragon is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may return it to your hand.
